description: Smokey tempeh replaces bacon in this satisfying cobb style salad.
name: Cobb Salad with Tempeh Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: In a shallow dish, whisk together half the olive oil, tamari, smoked paprika and a tablespoon of maple syrup. Add the tempeh slices and leave to marinate for 10 minutes, turning halfway through.
For the dressing, whisk the remaining olive oil and maple syrup together with the red wine vinegar.
Remove the tempeh from the marinade and cook for 2 minutes on each side in a non stick pan on a medium high heat.
Add the lettuce, red onion, avocado and cherry tomatoes to a large bowl, pour over the dressing and mix well.
Divide the salad between four bowls, top with slices of tempeh bacon and serve.
